thread.title: MCCALLY, A W
thread.title_full: WholeLatteLove.com reviewed by MCCALLY, A W

author: MCCALLY, A W
title: MCCALLY, A W
text: Great selection of quality espresso machines, sold by people who really know the products and who can offer valuable advice toward making the right decision. Free shipping, and unbelievably fast delivery given the heavy weight of my order (Rancilio Silvia and Rocky Grinder). I assumed it would take over a week, but the package arrived in Chicago in a few days. Great online instructional videos to get the most out of the products. Very happy with my purchase, and with the service I received beforehand and afterwards.
